delivery-date.required: Enter the date of the letter from the Home Office
delivery-date.future: The date is in the future
delivery-date.format: Enter the date in the correct format

received.required: Tell us if you have received a letter from the Home Office

address-match.required: Tell us if your address is the same as on the letter from the Home Office

email.email: Enter your email in the correct format for example, name@domain.com

address-street.required: Enter your new house name or number and street

date-of-birth.future: The date is in the future
date-of-birth.format: Enter your date of birth in the correct format.

first-name-error.required: Tell us your correct first name

last-name-error.required: Tell us your correct last name

date-of-birth-error.future: The date is in the future
date-of-birth-error.format: Enter your date of birth in the correct format.

birth-place-error.required: Tell us your correct place of birth

damaged-error.required: Tell us what is wrong with your BRP

photograph-error.required: Tell us what is wrong with your photograph

signature-error.required: Tell us what is wrong with your signature

sponsor-details-error.required: Tell us the correct sponsor details

country.required: Please tell us what country you are in

date-lost.required: This is a required field and must be completed
date-lost.future: Date cannot be in the future
date-lost.format: Please enter a valid date as day, month and year.

org-help.required: Tell us if you had help to complete this form

rep-name.required: Tell us the name of the person that helped you to complete this form

organisation.required: Tell us the name of the organisation that helped you to complete this form

no-letter.label: I don't have the letter anymore

delivery-details.label: If you think the courier may have had a problem delivering items to this address (for example there is no number on the door) then let us know and we will contact the courier. (optional)

address-street.label: House name or number and street

no-email.label: I do not have an email address

first-name-error.label: What is your correct first name?
first-name-error.title: This is the second line of name on your BRP card

last-name-error.label: What is your correct last name?
last-name-error.title: This is the first line of name on your BRP card

date-of-birth-error.label: What is your correct date of birth?

birth-place-error.label: What is your correct place of birth?

sponsor-details-error.title: This is the third line of remark on the front of your BRP card. These are details from your employer, university or college
sponsor-details-error.label: What is the correct sponsor reference?

signature-error.label: What is wrong with your signature?

photograph-error.label: What is wrong with your photograph?

conditions-error.label: This includes wrong expiry date, leave duration, remarks on front and on the back of the card.

journey.header: My BRP has not been delivered

about-error.header: What’s the problem with your BRP?
about-error.subheader: You can select one or more problems

contact-details.header: Where can we contact you to let you know about your BRP?

address.title: Please provide your address so that we can contact you by post

same-address.header: Is your address the same as the one on the letter from the Home Office?

address.title: Tell us your new address and we will organise another delivery.

personal-details.subheader: We need these details to find out what has happened to your BRP.

check-details.header: Is the information you gave us correct?
check-details.subheader: Check the information you have given us to make sure it is correct. If it is incorrect you can change it here.

org-help.title: Has an organisation filled in this information on your behalf?
org-help.explanation: This could be help from your immigration lawyer or representative, or a charity, employer, college or university.

footer.title: Send us your details
footer.explanation: By sending us your details you confirm that the information you have provided is true and that you accept our terms and conditions.

check-details-error.subheader: Check through the information that you have provided to make sure it is correct. If it is still incorrect you can change it here.

date-lost.header: When did you realise you no longer had your BRP?

confirmation.header: Thank you, we have received your information.
confirmation.privacy: We keep your personal data secure according to our privacy policy.
confirmation.email: We have sent you an email containing the information you have provided to

para.one: We will now review the information you provided to find out why you have not received the biometric residence permit.
para.two: We will contact you within 5 working days. We will tell you what to do when we contact you.
para.three: We will then advise you what to do next.

para.one: You should hear from us in the next working day, where we will advise you what to do.
para.two: You may need to apply for a replacement biometric residence permit.

para.one: You should hear from us in the next working day, where we will advise you what to do.
para.two: As you are outside the UK you may need to apply for a temporary ‘replacement BRP visa’ which you can use once to re-enter the UK. A replacement BRP visa costs £72.
para.three: You must apply online for a replacement BRP visa in most countries. https://www.gov.uk/apply-uk-visa.
para.four: When you are back in UK you should then apply for a replacement BRP within 1 month.

letter-received.header: Have you received a letter from the Home Office?

list.one: your application to stay in the UK was successful
list.two: your biometric residence permit (BRP) is going to be delivered

letter-received.date-question: What is the date on the letter?

para.one: If you haven't received a letter from the Home Office saying your application to remain in the UK was successful it may mean a decision about your application to stay in the UK has not been made yet.
para.two: Call the contact centre 0300 123 2241 or email them at mail@contact-centre.co.uk.

on-the-way.header: Your biometric residence permit should be on the way

one.second: working days since the letter from the Home Office letter saying your application to remain in the UK was successful.

two.second: working days, and if you still have not received your card, use this form to contact us.

conditions-and-length.header: Information about leave to remain in the UK

para.one: As you think the conditions or length of your leave are incorrect you must apply for administrative review, where this will be considered.
